title: Who is the best debater about religious issues? - Quora

response.answer_text: My personal favorite would be Matt Dillahunty  of The Atheist Experience TV Show. Watching him has taught me a lot. One day I'd like to shake his hand and thank him.  This dude's grasp of logic is unshakable. Furthermore, having formerly been a fundamentalist Southern Baptist Christian with intent on going to seminary, he has a firm understanding of the Bible; often better than the Christians he debates.
